name: Elemental Roshambo
description:
Master the 3 elements using rock paper scissors.

Z to change elements.

you lose if all your pixels are gone.

you win if the whole screen is your pixels.

water=blue

fire=red

plant=green

water beats fire

fire beats plant

plant beats water
